Grants a chance to receive bonus cloth scraps in addition to your gathering results. Material types are determined by your character level and location in the world.

As a part of our update to add gathering tool skins to the account wardrobe, gathering tools can now also be equipped with glyphs. Glyphs are a new type of upgrade that give your gathering tools additional beneficial properties when gathering, and they can be freely moved between tools without using an upgrade extractor. Gathering tools that already have bonus properties can be traded for new versions that convert their bonuses to glyphs at the Black Lion Exchange Specialist located in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch.

For more details about these changes, visit guildwars2.com. As always, thank you for your continued support!

Unlocks the recipe to craft Call of the Void.

As a part of our update to add gathering tool skins to the account wardrobe, gathering tools can now also be equipped with glyphs. Glyphs are a new type of upgrade that give your gathering tools additional beneficial properties when gathering, and they can be freely moved between tools without using an upgrade extractor. Gathering tools that already have bonus properties can be traded for new versions that convert their bonuses to glyphs at the Black Lion Exchange Specialist located in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch. For more details about these changes, visit guildwars2.com.

To celebrate, we'd like to gift you a glyph of your choice. Be sure to claim your Black Lion Glyph Selection Container from the Gem Store, available until April 24. As always, thank you for your continued support!
